channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Fixed an issue when the popup is shown on the screen above the menu bar.
  • Fixed an issue with footer shortcuts not working when it's hidden.
  • A pin letter "A" can no longer be used since it's reserved for a system paste shortcut.
  • A pin letter "W" can no longer be used since it's reserved for a close current window shortcut.
